name: Tiny Visitor
description:
A short, point-and-click game about encountering a new friend!

Created for and during the 2021 48-hour Global Game Jam with the theme of "Lost and Found".

|| How to Play ||

Progress the story by clicking on dialogue boxes and finding needed items. 

|| Credits ||

Artwork and Coding :: RyeTaran

Music :: Craigory Ham
